text: Te tumhala vicaratata ki tyancyasathi konakonate khadya ucita ahe. Tumhi sanga ki tumacyasathi svaccha sud'dha va pavitra vastu ucita aheta. Ani te sikari janavara, jyala tumhi prasiksana de'una tayara kele asela, jyanna kahi gosti sikavita, jya allahane tumhala sikavilya, tevha jara tumacyasathi te janavara, sikara jakhami karuna dharuna thevila ani tyala sodatana allahace nava tyacyavara ghyala tara ti sikara tumhi kha'u sakata ani allahace bhaya rakha nihsansaya, allaha lavakaraca hisoba ghenara ahe
